Sentencas: A porous cathode layer (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3) using mixed raw materials (La2O3, SrCO3, and MnCO3) was produced with a reactive plasma spray.
Titulo: Development of a cathode layer (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3) in a solid oxide fuel cell using a reactive plasma spray

Sentencas: Modeling for the particle vaporization process was carried out to investigate the particle behavior in a plasma flame.
Titulo: Development of a cathode layer (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3) in a solid oxide fuel cell using a reactive plasma spray

Sentencas: The reactively plasma sprayed deposits displayed large amounts of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 with relatively small amounts of SrO, MnO, and very little carbon.
Titulo: Development of a cathode layer (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3) in a solid oxide fuel cell using a reactive plasma spray

Sentencas: The degree of La0.8Sr0.2MnO3 increased with decreasing feeding rate of the feedstock at 30 kW. A smooth surface and homogeneous pore distribution with pore size of less than 1 mm were obtained at low pressure (0.33 bar).
Titulo: Development of a cathode layer (La0.8Sr0.2MnO3) in a solid oxide fuel cell using a reactive plasma spray
